懡懡懡

懡字的基本解释

懡
mǒ
〔懡??（
lu?）〕a.羞愧的样子，如“师一日造方丈，未及语，被祖诟骂，懡懡而退。”b.稀疏，如“公子亭台香触人，百花懡懡无精神。”

懡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǒ］
［《廣韻》亡果切，上果，明。］
见“懡”。

懡字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懡； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第40
【廣韻】亡果切【集韻】母果切，?音麼。【類篇】懡㦬，慚也。

懡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懡字的起名意思

暂无。

懡
Basic explanation of words
懡
mǒ
〔懡?? (
lu?)] a. A look of shame, such as "The teacher made an abbot in one day, but he didn't have time to speak, and he was scolded by the ancestors, and he would retreat without hesitation." b. Sparse, such as "The young man's pavilion touches people with fragrance, but the flowers are nothing spirit."
懡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǒ]
["Guangyun" dead fruit cut, fruit on, Ming. ]
See "懡".
懡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懡; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 406 to 40
[Guang Yun] Dead Fruit Cut [Ji Yun] Mother Fruit Cut,? Sounds. [Class articles] 懡㦬, shame.
懡
